[Random]: what most young {get() social} people wear,
farmer: sun faded clothes and shoes caked in mud
blacksmith: an apron smeared black over brown clothes and thick gloves
fisherman: clothes smelling of fish and tall black boots
merchant: almost gaudy clothing of many colors
rich: adorned with fancy markings and wearing some jewelry.
guard: a leather jacket over some padded clothes
poor: that doesn't fit and has all manner of rips and patches.
knight: knightly regalia. Under the tabbard displaying their coat of arms and chainmail.
